name: Hopeless (QuantumRamen)
description:
Your pride overtook you, the villagers told you the dragon was undefeatable, but you didn't listen. Now look at yourself, no sword, no shield, and 100% going to die. The battle is utterly hopeless, but prolong your inevitable death by surviving as long as possible!

Controls:

W - Move Up

A - Move Down

S - Move Left

D - Move Right

Instructions:

Dodge projectiles and survive as long as possible! Beat your time survived high-score!

Sound Credits:

Unnecessary Tension - Toby Fox

Credits:

Sebastian Carbajal

Miguel Aleman

Hanh Nguyen
